code: import*as types from'../../constants/constTypes';export function getList(list){return function(dispatch){dispatch({type:types.ADD_CART_LIST,payload:list});};}export function updateList(list){return function(dispatch){dispatch({type:types.CHANGE_CART_LIST,payload:list});};}export function addItem(item){return function(dispatch){dispatch({type:types.ADD_CART_ITEM,payload:item});};}
